title: Unable to install shap using pip
body:
Anyone else having troubles to install shap using `pip install shap`? 

```
Collecting shap
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/a8/77/b504e43e21a2ba543a1ac4696718beb500cfa708af2fb57cb54ce299045c/shap-0.35.0.tar.gz
    Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    running egg_info
    creating pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info
    writing requirements to pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info/requires.txt
    writing pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info/PKG-INFO
    writing dependency_links to pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info/dependency_links.txt
    writing top-level names to pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info/top_level.txt
    writing manifest file 'pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
    module 'os' has no attribute 'fspath'
    WARNING: The C extension could not be compiled, sklearn tree models not supported.
    running egg_info
    writing requirements to pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info/requires.txt
    writing pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info/PKG-INFO
    writing dependency_links to pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info/dependency_links.txt
    writing top-level names to pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info/top_level.txt
    reading manifest file 'pip-egg-info/shap.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
    reading manifest template 'MANIFEST.in'
    error: [Errno 20] Not a directory: 'shap/tree_shap.h'
    
    ----------------------------------------
Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /private/var/folders/mv/_shrjxhs21g97r2d1dzbn8zm0000gn/T/pip-install-yis94tg0/shap/
```
